sect2.title: Local/Remote Modes
sect2.para: The agent supports both local and remote modes.

sect2.title: Configuration
sect2.para: The following configuration options are available:

itemizedlist.listitem: Root folder: The folder which is the root of the monitored file structure.
File name pattern: The regular expression that is used to filter monitored files.
Ignore subfolders: If true only files will be processed; if false the processing will be recursive down the folder tree.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: For each monitored file, the agent provides the size and the date when the file was last modified.
